title: Aaron Rodgers on WRs, Hard Knocks pressure, 49ers-Vikings practice, NFL Top 100, and Cowboys-Chargers practice
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers on WRs, Hard Knocks pressure, 49ers-Vikings practice, NFL Top 100, and Cowboys-Chargers practice
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Aaron Rodgers comments on his young WRs.  Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty dissect the QB's comments and what they meant.  Another edition of Hard Knocks has the table rooting for the Lions this season.  The 49ers and Vikings will hold joint practices, so who will we be watching?  We wonder if Ja'Marr Chase or Micah Parsons will be higher on the NFL Top 100 before heading to the Cowboys-Chargers joint practices.  Peter explains why Dallas shouldn't be considered a power team in the NFC and why he has the 49ers and Cardinals over the Cowboys.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:keywords: Sports, Football, Good Morning Football, NFL, NFL Network, Jamie Erdahl, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, Jason McCourty, NFL Preseason, Green Bay Packers, Aaron Rodgers, Hard Knocks, Detroit Lions, Dan Campbell, Minnesota Vikings, San Francisco 49ers, Trey Lance, Kirk Cousins, Dallas Cowboys, Los Angeles Chargers, Dak Prescott, Justin Herbert, NFL Top 100, Ja'Marr Chase, Micah Parsons, New Orleans Saints
